017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
022
023import org.apiguardian.api.API;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGPreserveAspectRatio;
027import jakarta.activation.MimeType;
028
029/**
030 *  <p>{@summary The definition of the SVG element
031 *  <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code>.}</p>
032 *  <p>The <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code> element is the root element for any SVG
033 *  document, either stand-alone (in a file with the {@code *.svg} extension)
034 *  or embedded in an HTML file (or elsewhere - including another SVG
035 *  document). Therefore the definition for the namespaces is different for
036 *  each usage. This is reflected by the type
037 *  {@link SVG.Usage}.</p>
038 *
039 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: SVG.java 827 2021-01-04 17:01:34Z tquadrat $
041 *  @since 0.0.5
042 *
043 *  @see "https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/single-page.html#struct-SVGElement"
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 */
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVG.java 827 2021-01-04 17:01:34Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
049public sealed interface SVG extends SVGElementWithChildren, AllowsConditionalProcessingAttributes, AllowsDocumentEventAttributes, AllowsDocumentElementEventAttributes, AllowsGraphicalEventAttributes, AllowsPresentationAttributes, AllowsStyleAttributes
050    permits org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal.SVGImpl
051{
052        /*---------------*\
053    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
054        \*---------------*/
055    /**
056     *  The different usages for an {@code <svg>} element.
057     *
058     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
059     *  @version $Id: SVG.java 827 2021-01-04 17:01:34Z tquadrat $
060     *  @since 0.0.5
061     *
062     *  @UMLGraph.link
063     */
064    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVG.java 827 2021-01-04 17:01:34Z tquadrat $" )
065    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
066    public static enum Usage
067    {
068            /*------------------*\
069        ====** Enum Declaration **=============================================
070            \*------------------*/
071        /**
072         *  The {@code <svg>} element is used as the root for a stand-alone
073         *  document.
074         */
075        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
076        STANDALONE_DOCUMENT,
077
078        /**
079         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into HTML (but not
080         *  HTML&nbsp;5 - see
081         *  {@link #EMBED_HTML5}).
082         */
083        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
084        EMBED_HTML,
085
086        /**
087         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into HTML&nbsp;5; as
088         *  SVG is somehow part of the definition of HTML&nbsp;5, no further
089         *  namespace declarations are required.
090         */
091        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
092        EMBED_HTML5,
093
094        /**
095         *  The {@code <svg>} element will be embedded into another
096         *  {@code <svg>} element.
097         */
098        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
099        EMBED_SVG
100    }
101    //  enum Usage
102
103        /*-----------*\
104    ====** Constants **========================================================
105        \*-----------*/
106    /**
107     *  An empty array of {@code SVG} objects.
108     */
109    public static final SVG [] EMPTY_SVG_ARRAY = new SVG [0];
110
111        /*---------*\
112    ====** Methods **==========================================================
113        \*---------*/
114    /**
115     *  Adds a child to the definitions of this {@code <svg>} element.
116     *
117     *  @param  <E> The implementation type for the {@code children}.
118     *  @param  child   The child to add.
119     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given child is not valid to be
120     *      added to a {@code <defs>} element, or it does not have an id.
121     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
122     *      not this element.
123     */
124    public <E extends SVGElement> void addDefinition( final E child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException;
125
126    /**
127     *  Adds an SVG {@code <style>} element to the definitions of this
128     *  {@code <svg>} element. If there exists already a {@code <style>}
129     *  element, the new one will be merged into the existing one.
130     *
131     *  @param  style   The style to add.
132     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
133     *      not this element.
134     */
135    public void addStyle( final SVGStyle style ) throws IllegalStateException;
136
137    /**
138     *  Sets the default scripting language used to process the type strings
139     *  in event attributes. This language must be used for all instances of
140     *  script that do not specify their own scripting language.<br>
141     *  <br>The type specifies a media type as a MIME document identifier; the
142     *  default type is {@code application/ecmascript}.
143     *
144     *  @param  value   The default scripting language for this {@code <svg>}
145     *      element.
146     */
147    public void setContentScriptType( final MimeType value );
148
149    /**
150     *  Sets the dimension for this {@code <svg>} element.
151     *
152     *  @param  width   The width of the element.
153     *  @param  height  The height of the element.
154     */
155    public default void setDimension( final SVGNumber width, final SVGNumber height )
156    {
157        setHeight( requireNonNullArgument( height, "height" ) );
158        setWidth( requireNonNullArgument( width, "width" ) );
159    }   //  setDimension()
160
161    /**
162     *  Sets the height of the embedded {@code <svg>} element.
163     *
164     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
165     *      attribute will be removed.
166     */
167    public void setHeight( final SVGNumber value );
168
169    /**
170     *  Sets the mode for the aspect ration preservation for this {@code <svg>}
171     *  element.
172     *
173     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
174     *      attribute will be removed.
175     */
176    public void setPreserveAspectRatio( final SVGPreserveAspectRatio value );
177
178    /**
179     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given CSS style definitions as a style sheet in
180     *  an SVG {@code style} element to the <code>&lt;defs&gt;</code> element
181     *  of this <code>&lt;svg&gt;</code> element.}</p>
182     *  <p>This is <i>not</i> an attribute; instead an SVG {@code <style}
183     *  element will be created.</p>
184     *  <p>Consecutive calls to this method will not create additional
185     *  {@code <style>} elements, instead the new styles will be added to the
186     *  existing ones.</p>
187     *
188     *  @param  styles  The CSS style definitions.
189     *  @return The SVG {@code <style>} element with the style sheet
190     *      definitions.
191     */
192    public SVGStyle setStyleSheet( final CharSequence... styles );
193
194    /**
195     *  Defines the visible area in this SVG drawing area.
196     *
197     *  @param  x   The x coordinate of top left corner of the area.
198     *  @param  y   The y coordinate of top left corner of the area.
199     *  @param  width   The width of the area.
200     *  @param  height  The height of the area.
201     */
202    public void setViewBox( final SVGNumber x, final SVGNumber y, final SVGNumber width, final SVGNumber height );
203
204    /**
205     *  Sets the width of the embedded {@code <svg>} element.
206     *
207     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
208     *      attribute will be removed.
209     */
210    public void setWidth( final SVGNumber value );
211
212    /**
213     *  Sets the x coordinate for the top left corner of the embedded
214     *  {@code <svg>} element.
215     *
216     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
217     *      attribute will be removed.
218     */
219    public void setX( final SVGNumber value );
220
221    /**
222     *  Sets the y coordinate for the top left corner of the embedded
223     *  {@code <svg>} element.
224     *
225     *  @param  value   The type; if {@code null} the
226     *      attribute will be removed.
227     */
228    public void setY( final SVGNumber value );
229
230    /**
231     *  Sets the 'Zoom-and-Pan' flag; if enabled on a stand-alone instance of
232     *  the {@code <svg>} element, it allows to pan and zoom the image.
233     *
234     *  @param  flag    {@code true} enables the feature by setting
235     *      &quot;{@code magnify}&quot; to the attribute
236     *      {@value SVGUtils#SVGATTRIBUTE_ZoomAndPan}, {@code false} disables
237     *      it by setting the attribute to &quot;{@code disable}&quot;.
238     */
239    public void setZoomAndPan( final boolean flag );
240}
241//  interface SVG
242
243/*
244 *  End of File
245 */
